name: MindfulBreak
signal_source: Digital detox app reviews show users appreciate apps that 'address stress, boredom, or anxiety' with 76% of Americans considering digital detox
description: Intentional boredom cultivation app that guides users through productive offline activities during digital breaks
target_user: Users interested in digital wellness who want structured alternatives to screen time rather than just blocking apps
pain_point_evidence: Digital detox users seek apps that provide 'mindfulness practices' and help with 'boredom management' during offline periods
differentiation: Positive offline engagement vs. negative restriction, focuses on what to do instead of what not to do
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced activity library, progress tracking, and personalized recommendations

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic activities, premium for expanded library and tracking features
